title: Brain Relay
body:
Brain Relay was created as part of the Different Games Festival's XR Brain Jam which pairs VR/AR developers with neuroscientists. We learned that one of the most challenging parts of teaching neuroscience is helping students memorize the names of the structures of the brain. We built a multiplayer educational experience and game where instructors and students could inhabit a 3D model of a real brain scan and race along the paths that messages travel through the brain, learning the structures a long the way.

Brain Relay is a networked multiplayer experience for the Oculus Rift and Quest made using the Unity game engine.
